Shea Radiance Vitamin C (THDA) Face Oil

Brand: Shea Radiance

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Organic Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides (Fractionated Coconut Oil) *, Organic Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Seed Oil*, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate (Vitamin C), Adansonia Digitata (Baobab Seed) Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
